name: HKQuantitySample
desc: A sample that represents a quantity, including the value and the units.

items.name: init(type: HKQuantityType, quantity: HKQuantity, start: Date, end: Date)
items.desc: Returns a sample containing a numeric measurement.

items.name: init(type: HKQuantityType, quantity: HKQuantity, start: Date, end: Date, metadata: [String : Any]?)
items.desc: Returns a sample containing a numeric measurement with the provided metadata.

items.name: init(type: HKQuantityType, quantity: HKQuantity, start: Date, end: Date, device: HKDevice?, metadata: [String : Any]?)
items.desc: Returns a sample containing a numeric measurement with the provided device and metadata.

items.name: var count: Int
items.desc: The number of quantities contained in this sample.

items.name: var quantityType: HKQuantityType
items.desc: The quantity type for this sample.

items.name: let HKPredicateKeyPathQuantity: String
items.desc: The key path for accessing the sample’s quantity.

items.name: let HKPredicateKeyPathCount: String
items.desc: A key path for the sample’s count.
